dialog.intro:
Welcome! I'm your humble guide. I'm just a lowly bard though so don't expect much help. You're practically as good as alone. Basically all I have is knowledge of how you got here, a knack for narrating your life, and gobs of free time.

Anyway, let's start. After fidling with a cursed looking rabbit in woods that definitely had a "keep out" sign-

...

Yes, they did. There was at least one sign.

*ahem* You find you have been transported to what you are soon to learn is a magical realm. Adventure awaits!
